mapper.select: SELECT A.RW, A.BBS_NO, A.BBS_TITLE, A.BBS_CONTENT, A.BBS_IP, A.BBS_CREATE_DATE, A.BBS_HIT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BBS_NO DESC) AS RW, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IP, BBS_CREATE_DATE, BBS_HIT FROM BBS) A WHERE A.RW BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IP, BBS_CREATE_DATE, BBS_HIT ) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bbsTitle}, #{bbsContent}, #{bbsIp}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0)
